message.title: This is a simple observation.
message.description: See the source file of this validation. See next example.

message.title: Unicorn uses a custom XML format.
message.description: You can download the XML schema file of Unicorn responses on Unicorn public repository.

message.title: The root element of a Unicorn response file is an observationresponse element.
message.description:
It has two required attributes: the xml:lang attribute and a ref attribute which are respectively the default language and URI of the checked document. Both can be overridden.
It contains an optional status element and some message elements.
